snippet.title: ⚔️ Knights in Tight Spaces | Date Reveal Trailer | Wishlist Now! ⚔️
snippet.description:
A carrier pigeon has arrived with the most exciting news: Knights in Tight Spaces launches on March 4th!

A tactical deckbuilding game in the same universe as Fights in Tight Spaces, Knights in Tight Spaces' battles have a striking and stylish appearance, with strong action-movie visual effects and animations. Fight your way through challenging scenarios packed with enemies, while you vibe with the elegant soundtrack.
 
Wishlist Now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2315400/Knights_in_Tight_Spaces/
